          <title>
            <string language="en">Reflection and absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion und Absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion et absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão e absorption</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows why some things appear brighter than others.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brightness</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, warum einige Sachen heller 
als andere aussehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre pourquoi quelques choses
semblent plus lumineuses que d'autres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra porque algumas coisas 
parecem mais brilhantes do que outras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra perchè alcune cose 
sembrano più luminose di altre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γιατί μερικά πράγματα 
εμφανίζονται φωτεινότερα από άλλα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra porqué algunas cosas 
aparecen más brillantes que otras.</string>
          </description>
